questions.question: Where should the joke be placed in the README.md file?
options: In the introduction/overview section at the top
At the end as a closing remark
As a comment in code examples

questions.question: What type of joke would be most appropriate for a technical SDK documentation?
options: A programming/developer joke related to PostHog or analytics
A pun about agents or AI
A joke about configuration and setup
A joke about common developer frustrations
A light-hearted comment about the SDK's capabilities

questions.question: How should the joke balance with the professional documentation tone?
options: Make it a longer, more elaborate joke
Format it as a highlighted callout or note
Include it as a comment in code examples
Add it as a footnote or aside
Integrate it naturally into existing text

answers.selectedOption: In the introduction/overview section at the top
A programming/developer joke related to PostHog or analytics
